EmailTemplate.description: Notification that user has been added to a community.
EmailTemplate.name: D&S Communities: New Member Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to {!Community_Name}! To get started, follow these steps:
If you are a D&S portal Community user, go to {!Community_Url}.
If you are a salesforce.com standard Honeywell user, login to standard salesforce.com org, Click on the 'Honeywell Aerospace Internal' dropdown on the upper left corner and click on D&S Partner Community.
Thanks, {!Organization.Name}
